resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>dc23fe34-0283-49a0-92b4-7fccfb55a87c#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A települések mellé helyezd el a neveiket!</string>
            <string language="en">Put the names next to the correct domiciliation!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Setzen Sie die Namen nahe bei dem korrekten 
domiciliation!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mettez les noms à côté du domiciliation 
correct !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ponha os nomes ao lado do domiciliation correto!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metta i nomi vicino al domiciliation corretto!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάλτε τα ονόματα δίπλα στο σωστό domiciliation!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Ponga los nombres al lado del domiciliation 
correcto!</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Magyarország kultúrája a 14-15.században</string>
            <string language="en">Hungary's culture in 14.-15. centuries</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">történelem, A települések mellé helyezd el a neveiket!, interaktív feladat, térkép, települések</string>
            <string language="en">history, Put the names next to the correct domiciliation!, interactive exercise, map, domiciliations</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kultur Ungarns in 14.-15. Jahrhunderten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La culture de la Hongrie en 14.-15. siècles</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cultura de Hungria em 14.-15. séculos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Coltura dell'Ungheria in 14.-15. secoli</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολιτισμός της Ουγγαρίας σε 14.-15. αιώνες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cultura de Hungría en 14.-15. siglos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte, setzte die Namen nahe bei dem korrekten 
domiciliation!, interaktive Übung, Karte, domiciliations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'histoire, a mis les noms à côté du domiciliation 
correct !, exercice interactif, carte, domiciliations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o history, pôs os nomes ao lado do domiciliation 
correto!, exercício interativo, mapa, domiciliations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la storia, ha messo i nomi vicino al domiciliation 
corretto!, esercitazione interattiva, programma, domiciliations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η ιστορία, έβαλε τα ονόματα δίπλα στο σωστό 
domiciliation!, διαλογική άσκηση, χάρτης, 
domiciliations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la historia, puso los nombres al lado del domiciliation 
correcto!, ejercicio interactivo, correspondencia, 
domiciliations</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

    <name>
